sn4.9:1.2: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the Squirrel Sanctuary.
sn4.9:1.3: There the Blessed One addressed the bhikkhus thus:
sn4.9:2.1: “Bhikkhus, this life span of human beings is short.
sn4.9:2.2: One has to go on to the future life.One should do what is wholesome and lead the holy life;
sn4.9:2.3: For one who has taken birth, there is no avoiding death.
sn4.9:2.4: One who lives long, bhikkhus, lives a hundred years or a little longer. ”
sn4.9:3.1: Then Māra the Evil One approached the Blessed One and addressed him in verse:
sn4.9:4.1: “Long is the life span of human beings,
sn4.9:4.2: The good man should not disdain it.
sn4.9:4.3: One should live like a milk-sucking baby:
sn4.9:4.4: Death has not made its arrival. ”
sn4.9:5.1: “Short is the life span of human beings,
sn4.9:5.2: The good man should disdain it.
sn4.9:5.3: One should live like one with head aflame:
sn4.9:5.4: There is no avoiding Death’s arrival. ”
sn4.9:6.1: Then Māra the Evil One … disappeared right there.
